```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rworldmap)
library(ggplot2)

ourindex <- read_csv("CalculatedOurindex.csv")
test <- joinCountryData2Map(ourindex, joinCode = "NAME", nameJoinColumn = "CountryName")

par(mai=c(0,0,0.2,0),xaxs="i",yaxs="i")
mapCountryData( test, nameColumnToPlot="finalindex" )

```
